description.value:
Your mind is forged from the most powerful memories of a multitude of lifetimes. You have fragmentary knowledge of your prior lives and can leverage the experience gained during these lifetimes into raw psychic power.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ndvks6ztnxhj6oxh]{Burst Of Insight} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{False Life} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{Contact Other Plane} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0dcr75sqs8wpdrhg]{Ancestral Memory} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3w1ozzzf8hk0gdzm]{Reincarnate} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{Ethereal Jaunt} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v39qnirlhgje2c0e]{Bilocation} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).
